column5: My daughter and her boyfriend went to a local river today for a little fishing after work. 1, 2 foot carp on a piece of Strawberry flavored shredded wheat cereal.
Kids and Carp... always eating the same thing!!!
Yep. give it one more week then I'm going to be hunting them down. Spring carp  means huge monsters loaded with roe and can weight 35+  I won't be holding them this year.  dsn

LOL Glenn, water is still real cold here, maybe in the upper 30`s in the rivers and ponds, Lake Erie was like 36. Breakfast of Carp? not champions?  dsn, some of the bays of Lake Erie here can produce a 35+ carp anytime of the year, just some real pigs here.
